name: 3D Projection Demo (Love2D)
description:
A simple 3D Engine made in Love 2D from scratch with matrices, points, and multiplication. 

I'm developing this to add 3D backgrounds to my Gunner Zed Project:

try the game prototype here:

https://dwaynedev.itch.io/gunnier-zed

I plan to improve this to support:

 .obj model imports, UV textures, and basic lighting
